description.en: The provincial-level administrative body of Henan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市的国家权力机关。

description.en: The standing committee of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 郑州市军事管制委员会

zh-cn: 郑州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1948年中国人民解放军进驻郑州后成立的临时权力机构。
description.en: A provisional authority established in Zhengzhou after the People's Liberation Army entered the city in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任郑州市军事管制委员会主任。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, served as the Director of the Zhengzhou Military Control Committee.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府的前身，于1948年10月28日成立。
description.en: The predecessor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government, established on October 28, 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，郑州市人民民主政府首任市长。
description.en: Politician of the People's Republic of China, the first mayor of the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期河南省西部的一个行政管理机构。
description.en: An administrative body in the western part of Henan Province during the early years of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1968年间郑州市的行政管理机关名称。
description.en: The name of the administrative body of Zhengzhou City from 1955 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement that took place in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在郑州成立的临时权力机构，实行党政一元化领导。
description.en: A provisional organ of power established in Zhengzhou during the Cultural Revolution, exercising unified leadership over the party and government.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指导郑州市人民政府机构设置的改革文件。
description.en: A reform document guiding the institutional setup of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省的省会。
description.en: The capital city of Henan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府的派出机构之一。
description.en: One of the dispatched agencies of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 庄建球是郑州市人民政府的现任市长。
description.en: Zhuang Jianqiu is the current mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 陈宏伟是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Chen Hongwei is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 石秀田是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Shi Xiutian is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 陈红民是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Chen Hongmin is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王鸿勋是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Wang Hongxun is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 马志峰是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Ma Zhifeng is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 李凤芝是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Li Fengzhi is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王滔是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Wang Tao is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 张艳敏是郑州市人民政府的现任副市长。
description.en: Zhang Yanmin is a current deputy mayor of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王春晓是郑州市人民政府的现任秘书长。
description.en: Wang Chunxiao is the current Secretary-General of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府是河南省人民政府的业务上级机构。
description.en: The Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is organizationally subordinate to the Henan Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府由郑州市人民代表大会产生，是其组织上级机构。
description.en: The Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is created by and organizationally subordinate to the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 郑州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府对郑州市人民代表大会常务委员会负责并报告工作。
description.en: The Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is responsible to and reports its work to the Standing Committee of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 郑州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1948年10月22日，中国人民解放军进驻郑州，并于23日成立郑州市军事管制委员会。
description.en: On October 22, 1948, the People's Liberation Army entered Zhengzhou and established the Zhengzhou Military Control Committee on the 23rd.

relationships.target: 郑州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 张际春被任命为郑州市军事管制委员会主任。
description.en: Zhang Jichun was appointed as the Director of the Zhengzhou Military Control Committee.

relationships.source: 郑州市军事管制委员会

description.zh-cn: 1948年10月28日，郑州市军事管制委员会成立了郑州市人民民主政府。
description.en: On October 28, 1948, the Zhengzhou Military Control Committee established the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government.

description.zh-cn: 宋致和是郑州市人民民主政府的首任市长。
description.en: Song Zhihe was the first mayor of the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民民主政府成立后，隶属于豫西行署。
description.en: After its establishment, the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government was subordinate to the Yuxi Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月后，郑州市人民民主政府归河南省人民政府领导。
description.en: After May 1949, the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government was led by the Henan Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1949年6月，郑州市人民民主政府改为郑州市人民政府。
description.en: In June 1949, the Zhengzhou People's Democratic Government was renamed the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1955年1月，郑州市人民政府改称郑州市人民委员会。
description.en: In January 1955, the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government was renamed the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，于1968年1月成立了郑州市革命委员会。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Zhengzhou Revolutionary Committee was established in January 1968.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市革命委员会成立后，代行郑州市人民委员会的职权，导致后者职能停止。
description.en: After its establishment, the Zhengzhou Revolutionary Committee took over the functions of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Committee, causing the latter to cease functioning.

description.zh-cn: 在郑州市革命委员会存续期间，郑州市的正常政府职能由其代行，直到1980年12月革命委员会被撤销，郑州市人民政府才得以恢复。
description.en: During the existence of the Zhengzhou Revolutionary Committee, the normal functions of the municipal government were exercised by it until the committee was abolished in December 1980, allowing the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government to be restored.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》是郑州市人民政府的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the legal source of authority for the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府的印章由中华人民共和国国务院制发。
description.en: The official seal of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is manufactured and issued by the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府的机构设置是根据《郑州市机构改革方案》进行的。
description.en: The institutional setup of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is based on the 'Zhengzhou Institutional Reform Plan'.

description.zh-cn: 郑州市人民政府是郑州市的市级行政管理机关。
description.en: The Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government is the municipal-level administrative body for Zhengzhou City.

relationships.source: 中国（河南）自由贸易试验区郑州片区管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国（河南）自由贸易试验区郑州片区管理委员会是郑州市人民政府设置的工作部门。
description.en: The Management Committee of the Zhengzhou Area of China (Henan) Pilot Free Trade Zone is a working department of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 郑州航空港经济综合实验区管委会

description.zh-cn: 郑州航空港经济综合实验区管委会是郑州市人民政府设置的派出机构。
description.en: The Management Committee of Zhengzhou Airport Economy Zone is a dispatched agency of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 郑东新区管委会是郑州市人民政府设置的派出机构。
description.en: The Management Committee of Zhengdong New Area is a dispatched agency of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 郑州高新技术产业开发区管委会

description.zh-cn: 郑州高新技术产业开发区管委会是郑州市人民政府设置的派出机构。
description.en: The Management Committee of Zhengzhou High-tech Industrial Development Zone is a dispatched agency of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 郑州经济技术开发区管委会

description.zh-cn: 郑州经济技术开发区管委会是郑州市人民政府设置的派出机构。
description.en: The Management Committee of Zhengzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone is a dispatched agency of the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government.
